welcome_message: Welcome to Signal Product Management Consultation. I can help you transform your product organization using Marc Aiello's proven ecosystem methodology.
expert_intro: Using Marc's framework where 'Product = Everything the Customer Experiences', you'll escape the feature factory and build a value engine.
immediate_options: 📉 'We ship features but see no results' - Diagnose your value gaps
🤝 'Our teams aren't aligned' - Assess ecosystem dysfunction
💸 'What's the cost of doing nothing?' - Calculate your pain
signature_element: Let's understand your pain, then build the right solution package.
